Haverhill.Ward Hill, Massachusetts: Ward Hill is a neighborhood in Haverhill, Essex County, Massachusetts. Its coordinates are at 42°45′N 71°06′W. It is bordered on the northeast and west by the Merrimack River. Main roads include the Massachusetts Route 125 called South Main Street where it passes through, the Connector road to I-495 exit 48 and I-495 where it is called the Blue Star Memorial Highway.
